com.tools.socketproxy

Class TalkingProxyThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tools.socketproxy.TalkingProxyThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class TalkingProxyThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The client is talking to us, and we're sending it onto the server.
    Author:
    maartenl
    See Also:
    TalkingServerThread

    • Constructor Detail

      • TalkingProxyThread

        public TalkingProxyThread(java.net.Socket clientSocket,
                  java.net.Socket serverSocket,
                  SocketListener listener,
                  Conversation conversation)

        Construction.

        NOTE: It is allowed for the serverSocket to be null. In this case the messages from the client are not forwarded to the server, but they are recorded in the conversation.

        Parameters:
        clientSocket - the socket of the client
        serverSocket - the socket of the server
        listener - the listener to report to
        conversation - the conversation to record

    • Method Detail

      • msgAsString

        public java.lang.String msgAsString(char[] msg,
                           int length)
        Translate the message as a human readable array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        msg - the original message
        length - the length of the message
        Returns:
        a String showing the bytes, for example "0x0b 0x7a 0x51".
